ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 147
ygData.msgSnippet: Interesting.  I assume people who are not consumed with haggling down to the last cp, screwing you over, or obsessing over trade values are the stupid people?
ygData.messageBody:
Interesting. I assume people who are not consumed with haggling down
to the last cp, screwing you over, or obsessing over trade values are
the stupid people? Ever thought that people may have been stupid
because they liked you, were in a hurry, or much preferred the item
you had to trade?

No big deal, just the expression annoyed me.

>Show how little you know. Never had an item given to
>me in my life. earned every one of them. some things
>I really lucked out on. won a lizzie cloak in a lotto
>and then traded it for werewolf. Got some other
>things for extremely low prices from stupid people =)
>
>Hammeron
